- O que você deve ter?

• Analista de Teste SR

- Efetuar os testes de homologação nas aplicações da Financeira - Conhecimentos sólidos em OCTANE, JIRA, CONHECER O AMBIENTE FINANCEIRA Importante conhecer OFFICE. Conhecer ambiente mainframe, sistemas e processos de mudança. Para Oportunidade hibrida (3 dias presencial e 2 dias remoto) na região de Sto Amaro.

- O que temos pra te oferecer?

Mais do que um plano de carreira!

A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:

Carreira técnica: Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!

Carreira de Liderança: Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.

Experiência internacional: Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.

Empreendedorismo: De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.

- E os benefícios?

Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!

-

Como é trabalhar na BRQ?

Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions

title: Pessoa Executiva Comercial - Grandes Contas - Mercado Pago
description:
No Mercado Livre estamos democratizando o comércio e os serviços financeiros para transformar a vida das pessoas na América Latina. Faça parte deste propósito!

Nosso negócio Fintech oferece para toda a região uma proposta de valor integral, que visa democratizar os serviços financeiros e satisfazer as necessidades de mais de 60 milhões de usuários e usuárias. Disponibilizamos uma plataforma online que permite receber pelas vendas eletrônicas realizadas, tanto dentro como fora do Mercado Livre, e um sistema de códigos QR e dispositivos Point para as vendas realizadas no mundo físico. Para milhões de comerciantes, empreendedores e profissionais, damos a possibilidade de processar suas operações com segurança, através de mais de 50 meios de pagamento na América Latina. Além disso, fornecemos acesso gratuito a uma conta digital que permite pagar, enviar e receber dinheiro, gerar renda e trabalhar com cartões para fazer compras ou saques. Através do Mercado Crédito, concedemos créditos para satisfazer as necessidades daqueles a quem prestamos nossos serviços e potencializar os negócios de quem vende através da nossa plataforma.

Temos um desafio para as pessoas que: Vibram energia empreendedora: são movidas pela curiosidade, nunca desistem e estão focadas em superar seus próprios limites. Dão o máximo, porque adoram trabalhar com compromisso e dedicação. Encaram as mudanças como oportunidades e aprendem com seus erros. A excelência e a execução são primordiais na sua forma de fazer as coisas. Promovem o bom clima, a alegria e a diversão. Sabem como construir com outras pessoas e desfrutam trabalhando em equipe. Imagine você empreendendo projetos desafiadores, dinâmicos e inovadores,

e sendo responsável por: Trazer novos clientes para o canal, com perfil Grandes Contas . Atuar no funil inteiro de vendas, desde prospecção, qualificação e negociação. Acompanhar e analisar relatórios de atividades, assim como a eficiência do canal considerando dois KPIS, Volume Total de Pagamentos e Receitas. Garantir o desenvolvimento do canal, participando ativamente na estruturação da metodologia, processos e, até mesmo, produto. Trazendo inputs para áreas responsáveis, representando os clientes e acelerando as melhorias. Acompanhamento e compartilhamento das ações das concorrências, através de potenciais clientes, mercado e entorno competitivo diretos e indiretos.

Requisitos: Possuir formação superior completa. Experiência em canais de vendas com foco em aquisição e formação de carteira de clientes. Desejável conhecimentos em Adquirência. Nós lhe propomos: Ser parte de uma empresa com espírito empreendedor, na qual adoramos pensar grande e em longo prazo. Ser protagonista de seu desenvolvimento em um ambiente de oportunidades, aprendizagem, crescimento, expansão e projetos desafiadores. Compartilhar e aprender em equipe, com excelentes profissionais e especialistas. Um excelente clima de trabalho, com todo o necessário para você viver uma grande experiência. :) O Mercado Livre não faz contato oferecendo oportunidades em troca de pagamento de dinheiro. Você tem acesso a todas as oportunidades abertas no nosso site de carreiras. Caso receba pedidos de dinheiro, desconfie!

title: ANL SINISTRO SR (VIDA) - TEMPORÁRIO
description:
Sobre a MAPFRE Você já pensou em trabalhar em uma das maiores seguradoras do mundo? Além de ter o maior e mais completo portfólio do mercado, trabalhamos para proteger milhões de sonhos, vidas, bens e temos como missão cuidar do que é importante para você e nossos clientes, garantindo segurança, tranquilidade e proteção. Completamos 90 anos no mercado, operando em mais de 100 países nos 05 continentes e contamos com um time de mais de 30 mil colaboradores em todo o mundo. Presente desde 1992 no Brasil, atuamos com Investimentos, Consórcios, Capitalização, Previdência e Vida Resgatável, Saúde, Seguros e Assistência.

Nosso compromisso com a sociedade Aqui na MAPFRE contribuímos para uma sociedade mais sustentável, solidária e inclusiva. Temos o compromisso em apoiar diversidade, construindo um ambiente com igualdade e equidade. Valorizamos e apoiamos a presença de mulheres em cargo de gestão, a contratação de pessoa com deficiência e o equilíbrio racial e de gênero em nossas equipes. Essa é a nossa pegada! Gostou? Confira os detalhes da vaga abaixo:

As principais atividades Análise de sinistros de todos os produtos de VIDA; Elaboração de pareceres conclusivos; Identificação e suporte de sinistros suspeitos de irregularidade; Atendimento ao cliente; Suporte aos demais analistas da área;

O que esperamos de você Ensino superior completo; Mandatória experiência em análise de sinistros de VIDA em geral, com ampla atuação e expertise; Domínio técnico sobre condições gerais e particulares, bem como todas legislações vigentes pertinentes ao tema; Conhecimento da Legislação aplicável ao seguro de VIDA, Circulares SUSEP e técnica processual de tramitação de sinistros; Excel intermediário; Residir em São Paulo / SP;

Local de trabalho: SÃO PAULO / SP (Morumbi)

Nossos benefícios para você A jornada diária conta com horário flexível, formato de trabalho híbrido, incentivo a saúde e qualidade de vida com Plano de Saúde, Assistência Odontológica, Auxílio Academia, Vale-Refeição, Vale-Alimentação, Incentivo a Previdência Privada, Vale-Transporte ou Fretado, PLR, condições especiais na contratação de seguros da MAPFRE, auxílio babá ou creche, Universidade Corporativa e seguro de Vida. Nos importamos com o desenvolvimento dos nossos colaboradores e para isso, trabalhamos programas que promovem mobilidade, desenvolvimento, oportunidades de carreira e crescimento profissional. Mais do que apoiar, celebramos cada conquista! Confira nossas ações para promover desenvolvimento e crescimento profissional e pessoal: Programas de treinamento e desenvolvimento; Mobilidade funcional e geográfica; Avaliação de desempenho 360º; Benefícios sociais e programas de saúde; Projetos de voluntariado corporativo;

#PEGADAMAPFRE

title: Desenvolvedor Cloud - Remoto
description:
A Getronics é líder global em soluções de tecnologia, com uma equipe de mais de 4.000 colegas em 22 países, fornecendo serviços abrangentes de ponta a ponta em todo o mundo. Temos o compromisso de oferecer um atendimento excepcional ao cliente, para permitir que eles se concentrem em seus principais pontos fortes, enquanto confiam suas necessidades de TI à Getronics. Temos uma oportunidade incrível para você se juntar à nossa equipe, na seguinte vaga:

Desenvolvedor Cloud - Remoto O que oferecemos a você Assistência médica

sem desconto para titulares

; Assistência odontológica

sem desconto para titulares; Cartão flex tanto para alimentação quanto refeição; Auxílio home office para vaga remota; Vale transporte para posições presenciais ou híbridas; Auxílio creche; Seguro de vida; Aniversário Half Day Desconto em terapia: plataforma de apoio psicossocial; Parceria com instituições de ensino; Parceria com escolas de idiomas; Programa de subsídio para aulas de inglês; Programa de indicações: prêmio para indicações bem-sucedidas; Licença maternidade estendida de 180 dias e a licença paternidade de 20 dias; Treinamento completo fornecido como parte de um processo de indução robusto, incluindo oportunidades de desenvolvimento contínuo com nossa plataforma de aprendizado online NorthStar, LinkedIn Learning e Udemy, que possui mais de 80.000 cursos disponíveis; GetVibes - nosso programa de escuta ativa que nos permite conectar e ouvir feedback de todos os colegas, e como empresa, trabalhamos juntos para elaborar planos de ação para melhorar e desenvolver continuamente a Getronics!

O que esperar desta posição: Atuação em projeto de desenvolvimento e melhorias em sistemas bancários.

O que esperamos de você: Ambiente Cloud como Kubernetes ou Openshift Kafka/rabbitMQ Prometheus e Grafana OpenTelemetry Java ou Python Esteira CI/CD Gitlab ou Github

O que fazer em seguida: Caso você seja a pessoa que estamos procurando, aguarde nosso contato para te conhecermos melhor e siga as instruções durante o processo seletivo. Se você gostaria de fazer alguma pergunta sobre nossas vagas, sobre a Getronics como empresa ou qualquer outra coisa, por favor, não hesite em entrar em contato. A equipe de RH estará disponível no e-mail

title: NetSuite Project Manager
description:
We are Bring IT!

We are a fast growing, young and dynamic professional services company bringing digital transformation to our customers around the world. From taking products to the market, to

boosting productivity

with the right technology and processes, the work we do is improving the way people work. To get there, we’re

building a global and diverse team

that can tackle some of the most challenging problems of our time. We name this unique approach

“360 success” .

We are recognized as one of the

fast growing and successful companies

on the

INC5000 ranking

in the USA, and we are opening new offices around the world to further grow, explore and diversify. With over 10 recognitions from our partners, we continue to win in our markets.

Join our Dream Team

At Bring IT, we are a team of

over 150 people

spread across many countries around the world. We understand that great technology begins with great talent and diversity of thought. Our business is being built on friendship, hard work passion, and teamwork. This is shaping our culture every day and we’re looking for great talent that wants to

make an impact in the world . At Bring IT you can make a career and we are committed to seeing you grow both professionally and personally.

Community Impact

We are invested in making a positive impact for all people on our planet. That’s why we connect our objectives to the

United Nations sustainable goals , especially in clean energy, health & wellbeing and infrastructure. Moving forward we will start supporting special sustainability programs and perhaps you want to be part of that.

Discover your new role

As a

Sr Project Manager

you will lead a team of consultants throughout all stages of a implementations’ lifecycle.

Your Day-to-Day

As a Project Manager for our Implementations team, you will perform the following activities and responsibilities:

Control Planning:

Lead activities as project planning, creation of work breakdown structures, and change management control. Scope & Monitoring:

Manage scope throughout all phases of the project life cycle. Maintains accurate program estimates, timelines, project plans, and status reports. Ensure achievement of project milestones. Leadership:

Leads execution of multiple projects or manage an entire program Communication:

Act as lead communicator to internal and external stakeholders regarding expectations, resolutions, and prioritization. Ability to interact professionally with a diverse group of developers, product owners, and subject matter experts. Continuous improvement:

Lessons learned from project retrospective and applies for future projects.

Do you have what it takes?

Get ready to build your

360 success .

Must-have 5+ years of experience in project management. 3+ years of proven experience in delivering full-cycle ERP implementation projects. Experience in NetSuite ERP implementations. Full English Professional Fluency Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Desired Skills & Qualifications:

Suite Success methodology experience PMP certification is a plus The strong negotiation and interpersonal skills needed to be effective in a fast-paced high-energy company. Display initiative, self-motivation and deliver high-quality work while at the same time, meeting all deadlines for both internal and external customers.

Still not convinced you should apply?

In Bring IT we want to make a difference:

We provide best-in-class services on Oracle NetSuite, top services provider for Zendesk, Celigo, Boomi and other business cloud applications. We take our talent’s wellbeing very seriously with a dedicated program called Bring IT is You We value our Talent and provide learning and development opportunities for everyone We are a winning Company with a agile and innovative mindset.

Our Values and Culture

This year we have chosen

teamwork

as our value in focus. We believe with real teamwork we achieve

business excellence

and

creativity

for our customers. Working together, growing together. Our culture influences the way we interact, the context within which knowledge is created, the way we embrace change, and ultimately the way we share knowledge. We offer exceptional

career growth

and learning opportunities to our employees with

skill development workshops , mentoring programs, and support for side projects and entrepreneurial work.

Our Benefits and Perks

We offer

competitive compensation

and unique personal benefits, including industry-leading maternity and paternity leave, training program, happy hours, our wellness Friday´s and remote work opportunities. All team members have access to continuous learning opportunities including cloud certifications, mentorship and in-house leadership skills sessions developed by our experts in the field. Our development plan architect is waiting for you to design your personal plan.

Our Global Family

To support the global nature of our business and help our employees grow beyond their technical skills, we offer free virtual English language classes as well as provide immigration support when applicable. We are member of the Minority Business Enterprise, supporting their programs for minority businesses in the USA.

#BRINGIT=YOU

We create and foster a diverse, inclusive, and harassment-free workplace where everyone can achieve their full potential. All applicants will be considered for employment regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, or disability status.

Please note that by submitting your application, you agree with the terms and conditions of our Privacy Policy

title: KCF & RR facilitation senior
description:
Are you our new colleague?

We’re looking for a KCF & RR facilitation senior at Randstad Global Sao Paolo , Brasil , hybrid, fulltime

BR&AF The business risk and audit function (BR&AF) provides assurance and recommendations to the Executive Board and the Audit Committee on Randstad Group’s (risk) management, control and governance practices. Therefore the department facilitates in setting governance standards. It provides advice on internal control improvements, it conducts audits, special investigations and assignments worldwide on request of the Executive Board and Audit Committee. BR&AF’s responsibility includes the quarterly reporting based on: the risk and internal control self assessments, audit results, discussions on internal control weaknesses and analysis of the key risks reported throughout the company's management structure. This also substantiates the Group’s in-control statements. The global function consists of team members operating through hubs spread over 4 continents. The team is organized in a matrix consisting of control & audit focus teams on business and functional areas (e.g. digital, talent, client, back office & shared service centers and fraud & forensics) and partners that are the linking pin to operating units (business risk & audit partners) with a global view. A support group is set up for professional practice, learning & development, quality improvement & methods, analytics and PMO. Representatives of the different groups (Focus teams, BR&A Partners and support group) form the BR&AF core management team that reports to the Managing Director BR&AF.

how you will contribute You are part of the Business Risk & Audit Function (BR&AF) that covers all business operations related to Clients, Talents and our (shared) Back-, Mid- and Front offices, as well as our Accounting & Reporting and other specialist functions like HR. With your interpersonal and project support skills you are a key enabler of the operational success of the function.

As KCF & RR facilitation senior you: coordinate and facilitate the operational execution of the management control framework management self assessment process coordinate and facilitate the operational execution of ongoing enterprise risk assessment activities. enable reporting for both enterprise risk assessments as well as management control framework assessment results are willing to travel. As the standard office locations for the BR&AF team are organized in hubs, like in the country mentioned, travelling is estimated to be about 20% to 30% of the job.

what you will be doing In your role as KCF and RR facilitator you: technically enable and support the execution of internal control framework (KCF) self assessment and enterprise risk management as part of a wider GRC support team ensure data quality checks are in place and data is consolidated in support of integrated analytics initiatives support integrated analyses and reporting by designing and rolling out new analytical concepts and reports support the day to day operations of GRC (audit, risk, control) and analytics tooling support projects that are aimed to further automated key BR&AF processes

who will you work with MD BR&AF BR&AF MT business risk & audit Partners focus team teams control assessors throughout the company

what you will bring Your hands-on and in-depth understanding of supporting and managing global operations in combination with a lean way of thinking translates into a service oriented approach in which you bring effectiveness, efficiency and positive client experience together. You constantly seek ways to reduce workloads yet increase the value creation. you are vocal on the different clients of the processes you operate and you actively try to find a balance in optimizing the experience for all.

As a KCF & RR facilitation senior you: have minimum 3-5 years of relevant experience have college or university degree or the equivalent work experience have level BEC B1/B2 or higher Business English have a strong independent mindset are experienced in international stakeholder management & change are an innovative thinker that challenges the status quo have an agile and flexible working style and passion being the "spider in the web" and getting things done define a pragmatic, realistic yet ambitious vision on planning the staff members and getting all projects and audits done deliver full usages of all team members by coordinating their planning that is updated frequently ensuring people are timely informed and ready to start their assignments. work with people and engage them on the job ahead effectively connect and take people with different backgrounds allowing cross functional experts to take ownership of initiatives and projects.

your competencies Within Randstad we defined the following Leadership competencies: delighting people: connect people (client, talent, employee, society), building strong client relationships and delivering client-centric solutions. performing today: resourcefulness securing and developing resources effectively and efficiently. leading change: manages ambiguity operating effectively, even when things are not certain or the way forward is not clear. securing the future: drives vision and purpose painting a compelling picture of the vision and strategy that motivates others into action. creating clarity - showing line of sight: making sense of complex, high quantity and sometimes contradictory information to effectively solve problems and provides direction, is delegating and removing obstacles to get work done courage to challenge: shows courage and confidence to speak up skillfully, challenging others even when they are confronted with resistance or unfamiliar circumstances collaborates, reaches out, you excel in organizational sensitivity: maneuvering comfortably through complex policy, process and people-related organizational dynamics recognizing the value that different perspectives and cultures bring to an organization

what’s in it for you We put people at the heart of everything we do. Our employment conditions reflect this and are in accordance with the applicable (local) Randstad employment policies and related personnel guide. We want our teams and talent to reflect the rich diversity of the societies we serve. We thrive for an environment of belonging, safety and confidence. So everyone can bring their whole selves to work and flourish. Learn more about equity, diversity, inclusion and belonging at randstad

. If you recognize yourself in the profile above, we invite you to apply for this role.

people at the heart of everything we do Working at Randstad is unlike working at any organization. Because at Randstad we put people at the heart of everything we do. This goes for our clients, our talent, our employees and society. We combine our passion for people with the power of today’s technologies. This helps us support people and organizations in realizing their true potential. Learn more about our mission, history and values on our website:

For more information you can reach out to our recruitment business partner:



The recruitment procedure consists of a screening and at least two interviews. Later in the process, an (online) assessment and a job offer conversation take place.

title: Sr. Bloomreach Consultant
description:
Description iSoftStone, Inc. is seeking a Sr. Bloomreach Consultant to join our Team! Remote Opportunity

Summary: We are seeking a highly skilled

Senior Bloomreach Consultant

to lead the implementation, optimization, and integration of Bloomreach’s digital experience and commerce solutions. The ideal candidate will have

strong expertise in Bloomreach Experience (brX), Bloomreach Discovery, and Engagement

, along with a deep understanding of e-commerce, personalization, and AI-driven marketing strategies.

Experience with SAP Hybris (SAP Commerce Cloud) is also required.

Responsibilities: Bloomreach Implementation & Customization:

Lead end-to-end implementation of Bloomreach Experience (brX), including personalization, content management, and AI-powered search. E-commerce Optimization:

Work with cross-functional teams to optimize digital experiences using Bloomreach’s AI-driven capabilities for personalization and recommendations. Integration & API Management:

Configure and integrate Bloomreach with third-party systems, including CMS, CDPs, CRM, and e-commerce platforms like Shopify, Magento, and

SAP Hybris (SAP Commerce Cloud)

. Customer Engagement & Strategy:

Advise clients on best practices for leveraging Bloomreach’s AI-driven engagement features to enhance customer journeys. Performance Monitoring & Optimization:

Analyze customer data and system performance, optimizing content search, recommendations, and marketing automation strategies. Stakeholder Collaboration:

Work closely with marketing, IT, and product teams to align Bloomreach solutions with business objectives. Training & Documentation:

Provide training and documentation to internal teams and client stakeholders for seamless adoption. Qualifications: 5+ years of experience

in digital experience, personalization, or e-commerce platforms. Hands-on experience with Bloomreach (brX, Discovery, Engagement)

– implementation, configuration, and optimization. Strong expertise in

e-commerce, personalization strategies, and AI-driven recommendations

. Experience with

SAP Hybris (SAP Commerce Cloud). Proficiency in

Java, JavaScript, APIs, and cloud-based architectures

is a plus. Experience with

Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, and A/B testing tools

. Strong communication and stakeholder management skills. Prior experience working with enterprise clients in

retail, e-commerce, or digital marketing

. Preferred Qualifications: Certification in

Bloomreach brX or Engagement

. Experience with

headless commerce solutions

and omnichannel strategies. Knowledge of

data-driven marketing, CDPs, and AI-based customer engagement

.

iSoftStone is a global IT service and consulting company that creates value and drives success through technology solutions, service excellence, and digital innovation. We specialize in web and application development, software testing and support, data and content management, digital experience, accessibility, and data for machine learning and AI. With 20 delivery centers and more than 90,000 employees worldwide, iSoftStone is proud to serve some of the world’s most well-known businesses, including 90+ Fortune Global 500 companies.

Visit us at

.

title: Full Stack Engineer (Ruby/ReactJS)
description:
Andela exists to connect brilliance and opportunity. Since 2014, we have been dedicated to breaking down global barriers and accelerating the future of work for both technologists and organizations around the world. For technologists, Andela offers competitive long-term career opportunities with leading organizations, access to a global community of professionals, and educational opportunities with leading technology providers.

At Andela, we’re deeply passionate about creating long-lasting and transformative growth opportunities for all - and doing it in an E.P.I.C. way! We’re excited to continue building our remote-first team with incredible people like you. After applying for this role, you will join our Andela Community of brilliant technologists by passing a technical screening and live interview. As a community member, you’ll have access to a multitude of exclusive technologist roles. Join Andela today to access this opportunity and more in our global marketplace! Our roles are typically filled at lightning speed, so if you’re considering applying, get your application in quickly!

About the client: It is a fintech company that helps users invest spare change from everyday purchases into diversified portfolios, offering automated savings and investment solutions.

The ideal candidate will be a Full Stack Developer

to join our client’s team. This role will focus on designing, developing, testing, and deploying scalable backend services and APIs that support customer financial accounts, financial transactions, large-scale data processing, and integrations with third-party providers. The ideal candidate will have expertise in full-stack development, microservices architecture, and cloud-based solutions..

Responsibilities: Backend Development: Design and develop backend services for maintaining customer financial accounts and transactions. Implement scalable solutions for processing large datasets using batching, caching, parallelization, streaming, and queuing strategies. Utilize

RDBMS and NoSQL databases , virtual machines, on-demand workers, and messaging systems.

API Development: Develop GraphQL and RESTful APIs for seamless integration with third-party services. Ensure APIs support both synchronous and asynchronous processing. Facilitate integration with

iOS, Android, and Web clients .

Frontend Development: Develop and maintain

React

applications for a seamless user experience. Ensure frontend applications effectively interact with backend APIs. Optimize web performance and implement responsive designs.

Software Development & Deployment: Design, develop, test, and operate

microservices solutions . Maintain and enhance code repositories, system documentation, and CI/CD pipelines. Implement

test automation

and contribute to QA testing frameworks. Collaborate with backend service engineering teams to coordinate testing and deployments.

Required skills: Proficiency in

TypeScript, Ruby on Rails, React, AWS, and SQL . Experience with

Git, Harness, and Testrails . Strong background in

RDBMS . Familiarity with software development best practices, including Agile methodologies.

Nice to have skills: E xperience with

Java, Scala, Spark, Databricks, and Python . Knowledge of

big data processing frameworks

and distributed computing. Prior experience in the

financial services or investment industry .

At Andela, we know our strengths lie in our diverse community whose talents, perspectives, backgrounds and orientations we take pride in. Andela is committed to nurturing a work environment where all individuals are treated with respect and dignity. Everyone has the right to work in a professional atmosphere that promotes equal employment opportunities and prohibits discriminatory practices. Andela provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants without regard to factors including but not limited to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, pregnancy (including breastfeeding), genetic information, HIV/AIDS or any other medical status, family or parental status, marital status, amnesty or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws. This commitment applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including but not limited to hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training. Our policies expressly prohibit any form of harassment and/or discrimination, as stated above.

title: DevOps Engineer (GCP)
description:
We are a digitally native technology services company where innovation, design and engineering meet scale. We use some of the latest technologies in the digital and cognitive field to empower organizations in every aspect. Right now, we are looking for

Senior DevOps Engineer

to join our team at Globant!

You will get the chance to:

Work with professionals who have created some of the most revolutionary solutions in their fields. Make an impact. Work in large-scale projects globally. Develop your career in our Studios. Each Studio represents deep pockets of expertise on the latest technologies and trends and delivers tailored solutions focused on specific challenges. Develop your career within an industry or multiple industries. Be empowered to choose your career path: we have more than 600 simultaneous projects, so you can choose where and how to work. Be part of an agile pod. Driven by a culture of self-regulated teamwork, each team -or POD- works directly with our customers with a full maturity path that evolves as they increase speed, quality and autonomy.

What will help you succeed:

English communication skill is a must (B2 or upper). GCP and cloud cost optimization for scales above 3M/year; Deployment and administration of Docker/Kubernetes; IaC and automation tools such as Terraform, Puppet, and Ansible; CI/CD tools, including Cloud Build, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps, and Jenkins; Git version control tool; Security tools for DevOps such as Forseti, TFSEC, and Docker Scan; Google Cloud Load Balancing, Nginx, and Apache web servers; Linux and Windows Server operating systems; Relational (Cloud SQL: MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server) and non-relational (Firestore, Bigtable, MongoDB) databases; Python and other scripting languages; Networks, VPC, hybrid connectivity (Cloud VPN, Interconnect).

At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment makes us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

Are you ready?

Job Segment:

DevOps, Cloud, CI/CD

title: Social Seller
description:
SDR/Social Seller

O

Social Seller

é o profissional da área comercial responsável por construir relacionamentos sólidos através das redes sociais com os potenciais clientes/leads e direcioná-los para a venda. O

SDR

é um profissional da área de pré-vendas que atua na prospecção, qualificação de leads e agendamento para o Closer. Principais Atividades: Prospecção ativa e qualificação de leads por meio de Instagram, cold calls e WhatsApp. Construção de relacionamento e engajamento com potenciais clientes, criando conexões estratégicas. Direcionar os leads qualificados para fechamento de vendas diretamente por mensagens/DM ou encaminhá-los para uma reunião com o Closer. Envio de relatórios e utilização de ferramentas de CRM, como o Kommo, para registrar e acompanhar as métricas e interações com os leads. Participar de reuniões de alinhamento para garantir a sincronia entre as estratégias de vendas e as metas da equipe.

O que esperamos de você? Vontade de crescimento. Habilidade de comunicação e persuasão. Organização e disciplina. Capacidade analítica. Energia e proatividade.

O que oferecemos: Salário fixo + comissões atrativas (ganhe de acordo com seu desempenho). Trabalho

100% remoto

. Acompanhamento com o Head Comercial. Acesso ao nosso programa de mentoria e treinamento gravado. Plano de crescimento na área comercial.

title: Pessoa Arquiteta de Soluções IA
description:
Somos inspired by tech powered by people. Por isso, precisamos de pessoas apaixonados por desafios e com sede de aprendizado contínuo. Buscamos por novos makers para sonharem com a gente, que enxerguem além do óbvio e que estejam prontos para se juntar a nós nessa jornada de transformação e crescimento. Estamos expandindo nossos horizontes e buscamos pessoas que compartilhem dessa mesma paixão pela tecnologia e pelo aprendizado contínuo. Se você se encaixa nesse perfil, venha fazer parte do nosso time!

RESPONSABILIDADES E ATRIBUIÇÕES Definir e projetar arquiteturas de dados escaláveis que suportem múltiplos projetos de Inteligência Artificial, garantindo alta disponibilidade, performance e segurança. Selecionar e implementar infraestruturas de dados em nuvem (AWS, Azure, GCP) garantindo a melhor relação custo-benefício para diferentes cargas de trabalho. Projetar pipelines de dados robustos e automatizados para ingestão, transformação e disponibilização de grandes volumes de dados para treinamento e inferência de modelos de IA. Definir e implementar estratégias de armazenamento eficientes para diferentes tipos de dados (estruturados, semiestruturados, não estruturados), utilizando Data Lakes, Data Warehouses e bancos de dados distribuídos. Garantir a governança de dados , incluindo versionamento, controle de acesso, auditoria e conformidade com normas regulatórias. Criar e gerenciar ambientes escaláveis para execução de modelos de IA , considerando desde treinamento distribuído até inferência em tempo real. Definir padrões e frameworks de MLOps e DataOps , garantindo a automação, monitoramento e escalabilidade de pipelines de Machine Learning e Deep Learning. Garantir alta disponibilidade e tolerância a falhas nas soluções de dados, aplicando estratégias de replicação, balanceamento de carga e recuperação . Projetar soluções para processamento distribuído e otimização de workloads intensivos, utilizando tecnologias como Apache Spark. Definir estratégias de caching e otimização de consultas para acelerar acesso a dados. Monitorar e otimizar o desempenho da infraestrutura de dados e IA, ajustando recursos de computação, armazenamento e rede conforme a demanda. Documentar a arquitetura de dados e infraestrutura de IA , garantindo que o conhecimento seja compartilhado e replicável em outros projetos.

REQUISITOS E QUALIFICAÇÕES Formação acadêmica em Ciência da Computação, Engenharia, Sistemas de Informação ou áreas correlatas. Experiência comprovada no desenho e implementação de arquiteturas de dados e infraestrutura para projetos de IA em larga escala. Conhecimento profundo em computação em nuvem (AWS, Azure, GCP) e em como provisionar recursos para projetos de IA (GPU instances, Auto-scaling, Lambda Functions, etc.). Experiência com contêineres e orquestração usando Docker, Kubernetes para escalabilidade de pipelines de IA. Familiaridade com arquiteturas de armazenamento distribuído , como HDFS, Amazon S3, Google Cloud Storage e Azure Data Lake. Experiência com processamento distribuído e otimização de cargas de trabalho. Conhecimento em bancos de dados de alto desempenho. Experiência na definição de estratégias de segurança e compliance , incluindo criptografia de dados, autenticação e autorização via IAM, e auditoria de acessos. Capacidade de balancear custos e desempenho da infraestrutura , otimizando o uso de recursos de computação e armazenamento. Conhecimento em redes e arquiteturas de comunicação entre sistemas distribuídos. Experiência com MLOps e CI/CD para IA para automação da infraestrutura. Habilidade para definir estratégias de versionamento e monitoramento de modelos de IA em produção. Capacidade de liderança técnica e colaboração com equipes multidisciplinares , incluindo engenheiros de software, cientistas de dados e arquitetos de soluções.

Diferenciais: Certificações em cloud computing e arquitetura de dados (AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Google Professional Data Engineer, Azure Data Engineer). Experiência na implementação de arquiteturas híbridas e multi-cloud , garantindo interoperabilidade entre diferentes provedores de nuvem. Conhecimento avançado em inferência acelerada para IA , utilizando GPUs, TPUs e frameworks Experiência com arquiteturas serverless para otimização de custos e escalabilidade. Experiência em liderança de projetos e mentoring de equipes técnicas.

title: Scrum Master Sr
description:
Job Description

A Genesis Consulting tem uma oportunidade imediata para Scrum Masters experientes e com verdadeira paixão por crescimento profissional e transformação de negócios através do lean-agile. Nossos clientes são alguns dos principais líderes mundiais em diferentes indústrias e o candidato fará parte de projetos desafiadores para construir e apoiar soluções técnicas para suas necessidades. Junte-se ao nosso time e seja um agente facilitador de resultados de negócios através dos conceitos de Business Agility, Lean, Agile, Kanban e SAFe.

O Scrum Master trabalhará com equipes de entrega ágil para aprimorar e habilitar o desempenho de nível de equipe e entrega de valor usando o Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe).

Duties and Responsibilities: · Coach de equipes referentes aos valores e princípios lean-agile; · Facilitar cerimônias ágeis no nível de time (Retrospectiva, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review, Sprint Planning, Refining), garantindo o entendimento e engajamento total da equipe em tais; · Promover o mindset e práticas de melhoria contínua para as equipes ágeis; · Integração das melhores práticas e padrões de agilidade em um contexto altamente regulado; · Fomentar o senso de responsabilidade compartilhada nas equipes e stakeholders; · Facilitar a resolução de ou impedimentos existentes para os times; · Gerenciar interdependências entre equipes ágeis; · Trabalhar com Product Owners para apoiar o planejamento de Curto Prazo e evolução da definição/priorização do Backlog de produto do time; · Proteger as equipes de interferências externas que possam impactar princípios de agilidade, produtividade da equipe e/ou estágio de formação da equipe; · Participar e auxiliar na facilitação de todas as cerimônias em um ambiente ágil escalado (SAFe Essential);

Minimum Qualifications/Experience: · Experiência comprovada como Scrum Master/Agile Master (conhecimento será testado); · Experiência em ambiente regido pelas cerimônias do SAFe · Vivência de TI em projetos de desenvolvimento de soluções complexas e de alta disponibilidade · Experiência com diferentes modelos, métricas e cerimônias no nível de equipe ágil · Experiência com ferramentas de gerenciamento de trabalho ágil (Jira), incluindo configuração, planejamento e relatórios · Capacidade promover agilidade em diferentes cenários sendo responsável por garantir que as equipes entendam e operem de acordo com os valores e princípios de agilidade · Conhecimento em outros métodos e práticas ágeis além do Scrum

Minimum Education: · Bachelor’s Degree

Required Certifications: · Possuir certificação KMP, PSPM e MGT 3.0 · Possuir certificação SAFe (plus)

Other: · English (plus)

title: Key Accounts Sales Manager of Latin America
description:
Company :Sungrow Hydrogen

Postion: Key Accounts Sales Manager Report line: report to SUNGROW Hydrogen Latin America Head of Marketing and Sales Location: Brasil or Chile , could travel as needed.

Company Induction: As the subsidiary of Sungrow (Stock Code: 300274), Sungrow Hydrogen Sci.&Tech. Co., Ltd. (hereinafter Sungrow Hydrogen) specializes in water electrolysis technology for hydrogen production. Its main products include ALK electrolyzer, PEM electrolyzer, PWM hydrogen production power supply, gas-liquid separation equipment, hydrogen purification equipment and intelligent hydrogen management system. Sungrow Hydrogen is committed to providing“efficient, intelligent, safe” flexible green hydrogen production system solutions. Sungrow Hydrogen adheres to market demand orientation, and takes technological innovation as the driving force for development. It has cultivated a professional R&D team with rich experience and strong independent innovation ability, applied for more than 480 patents and copyright certificates, participated in the drafting of a number of industrial standards, mastering core technologies of flexible green hydrogen production and offshore wind hydrogen production. The company has built a leading 20MW water electrolysis hydrogen production empirical base, a product research center, a key materials research center, a Hydrogen Research Institute in Germany, and the world's leading hydroge

Main responsibilities:

As a key member of sales organization to accomplish the revenue, margin and account receivable target set on annual basis. The candidate will need to manage key accounts and maintain long-term partnership. The candidate will work with all major utilities, owner, developer, EPC, O&M customers to drive the business. The candidate will perform in business development role for potential market segment or new market. The candidate will also need to perform the following: Help to develop product marketing strategy and establish a long-term strategic partnership with key account Have strong sales ability to close deal and achieve the sales target and KPI Periodically visit key customers，and have project order contacts with leading contractors (big scale) in Hydrogen related industry Help company to gain better brand recognition by assisting trade shows and other public functions; Collect market information, including emerging market data, industry trend, product standard and competitor’s information etc. The candidate will work closely with technical team to fulfill customers’ request and timely communicate with HQ; Other assigned tasks as required.

Qualifications:

Minimum 5 years’ sales experience and 2 years’ direct sales experience in the PV and Wind energy related business. Familary with renewable energy industry in Latin America /European and have a good understanding of business culture in this area. Having a wide network with key players in renewable energy industry is perferred. Having strong ability to build up the customer’s relationship quickly is perferred. Professional in dealing with international business. Good teamwork and strong team coordination ability. Public speaking skills is a plus Excellent communication skills and team player Self-starter and continuous learner Strong passion about hydrogen industry

title: Senior SAP Sales Specialis, Remote Brazil
description:
✨✨Important: Please apply with your CV in English.✨✨ Project Description As a Senior SAP Sales Consultant at DXC Technology, you will play a pivotal role in driving the growth and success of our SAP services within the LATAM region. Your expertise in SAP solutions, combined with a deep understanding of sales processes, will enable you to deliver innovative solutions that meet our clients' business objectives.

Responsibilities Sales Leadership: Lead the end-to-end sales process for SAP solutions, from prospecting to deal closure, ensuring revenue growth and market penetration in the LATAM region. Client Engagement: Develop and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers and influencers within client organizations. Act as a trusted advisor on SAP capabilities and business transformation strategies. Opportunity Development: Identify, qualify, and manage SAP sales opportunities. Work closely with pre-sales teams to create tailored SAP solution proposals. Market Understanding: Leverage in-depth knowledge of the LATAM market, including specific industry trends, local business practices, and regulatory requirements, to position DXC SAP offerings effectively. Collaboration: Partner with internal teams, including delivery, pre-sales, and marketing, to ensure alignment and seamless execution of sales strategies. Pipeline Management: Maintain accurate sales forecasts and report progress to management regularly. Use CRM tools to manage the sales pipeline effectively.

Qualifications: Experience: Minimum of 7 years in enterprise sales, with a proven track record of achieving or exceeding revenue targets in the SAP ecosystem. SAP Expertise:Strong understanding of SAP products, including SAP S/4HANA, SAP Cloud solutions, and industry-specific SAP modules. Sales Skills:Demonstrated ability to close complex, high-value deals. Experience in solution-based selling is essential. Industry Knowledge:Familiarity with key industries in LATAM, such as manufacturing, retail, financial services, or public sector. Languages:Proficiency in Spanish and English is required; Portuguese is a plus. Education:Bachelor's degree in Business, Information Technology, or a related field. MBA is an advantage.

Preferred Skills: Experience with cloud-based SAP solutions and digital transformation projects. Familiarity with SAP licensing models and commercial structures. Strong negotiation and presentation skills. Knowledge of sales methodologies such as Challenger, MEDDIC, or SPIN.

Languages English: C1 Advanced

title: DevOps Engineer - Work from home
description:
Explore the Nearsure experience! Join our close-knit LATAM remote team:

Connect through fun activities like coffee breaks, tech talks, and games with your team-mates and management.

Say goodbye to micromanagement!

We champion autonomy, open communication, and respect for diversity as our core values.

⚖️Your well-being matters:

Our People Care team is here from day one to support you with everything from time-off requests to wellness check-ins.

Plus, our Accounts Management team ensures smooth, effective client relationships, so you can focus on what you do best.

Ready to grow with us?

Here’s what we offer you by joining us!

✨ Competitive USD salary

– We value your skills and contributions! 100% remote work

– While you can work from anywhere, you’re always welcome to connect with teammates and grow your network at our coworking spaces across LATAM! Paid time off – Take the time you need according to your country’s regulations, all while receiving your full salary. Rest, recharge, and come back stronger! National Holidays celebrated

– Take time off to celebrate important events and traditions with loved ones, fully embracing your culture. Sick leave – Focus on your health without the stress. Take the necessary time to recover and feel better. Refundable Annual Credit – Spend it on the perks you love to enhance your work-life balance! Team-building activities – Join us for coffee breaks, tech talks, and after-work gatherings to bond with your Nearsure family and feel part of our vibrant community. Birthday day off

– Enjoy an extra day off during your birthday week to celebrate in style with friends and family!

About the project:

As a

Semi Senior DevOps Engineer

, you will be responsible for configuring and managing Azure AD B2C, ensuring secure authentication flows, and integrating SSO with external platforms. You will also design and maintain CI/CD pipelines to automate the deployment of web applications. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in identity management and DevOps automation.

How your day-to-day work will look like

✅ Set up and configure Azure AD B2C for identity and access management. ✅ Implement OAuth2 and OpenID Connect (OIDC) to enable SSO between Dynamics 365 Portal and third-party applications. ✅ Customize authentication flows, including sign-up processes and email templates. ✅ Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment of web applications. ✅ Ensure secure and scalable authentication solutions for cloud-based applications. ✅ Troubleshoot and resolve authentication and deployment-related issues. ✅ Optimize cloud infrastructure and deployment processes for efficiency and security.

This would make you the ideal candidate

✨ Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. ✨ 5+ Years of experience working with Identity Governance and administration experience (Identity providers, Identity managers, Identity access, and authentication workflows). ✨ 3+ Years of experience working with Azure AD B2C configuration and management. ✨ Strong understanding of OAuth2 and OIDC for secure authentication. ✨ Experience in CI/CD pipeline automation (Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, or similar). ✨ Experience with customizing authentication flows and email templates in Azure AD B2C. ✨ Experience configuring SSO (Single Sign-On) between Dynamics 365 Portal and third-party applications using Azure AD B2C or similar identity management solutions. ✨ Troubleshooting skills for authentication, SSO, and deployment issues. ✨ Familiarity with containerization tools (Docker, Kubernetes). ✨ Advanced English Level is required for this role as you will work with US clients. Effective communication in English is essential to deliver the best solutions to our clients and expand your horizons.

What to expect from our hiring process

1. Let’s chat about your experience! 2. Impress our recruiters, and you’ll move on to a technical interview with our top developers. 3. Nail that, and you’ll meet our client - your final step to joining our amazing team!

At Nearsure, we’re dedicated to solving complex business challenges through cutting-edge technology and we believe in the power of tailored solutions. Whether you are passionate about transforming businesses with Generative AI, building innovative software products, or implementing comprehensive enterprise platform solutions, we invite you to be part of our dynamic team!

We would love to hear from you if you are eager to make an impact and join a collaborative team that values creativity and expertise.

Let’s work together to shape the future of technology!

‍ Apply now!

By applying to this position, you authorize Nearsure to collect, store, transfer, and process your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. For more information, please review our Privacy Policy. (

description:

Somos

parceiros estratégicos

de nossos clientes na jornada de transformação digital, oferecendo soluções inovadoras para a implementação de

tecnologias em nuvem . Com o apoio do nosso time de especialistas, auxiliamos na migração para ambientes em nuvem, modernização de aplicações, segurança de dados, serviços gerenciados e práticas de FinOps eficientes.

title: Desenvolvedor full stack
description:
Desenvolvedor Fullstack Sênior (Node.js + React) Detalhes do projeto

: Buscamos um Desenvolvedor Fullstack Sênior com sólida experiência em Node.js, React, SQL, crons, Docker, Argo CD, Sequelize e TypeORM. O profissional será responsável pelo desenvolvimento e manutenção de aplicações robustas e escaláveis, além de atuar na otimização de processos e automação de infraestrutura.

Atividades

: • Desenvolver e manter aplicações backend em Node.js, utilizando Sequelize e TypeORM para interação com bancos de dados relacionais. • Criar e otimizar APIs RESTful e serviços para comunicação entre sistemas. • Implementar e manter aplicações frontend utilizando React.js e TailwindCSS. • Criar e gerenciar tarefas agendadas (crons) para automação de processos críticos. • Implementar e gerenciar containers com Docker e orquestração com Argo CD. • Desenvolver consultas otimizadas em SQL Server, PostgreSQL ou MySQL. • Atuar na integração e manutenção de pipelines CI/CD para garantir entregas contínuas e seguras. • Diagnosticar e corrigir problemas de performance e segurança no backend e frontend. • Trabalhar com metodologias ágeis, garantindo boas práticas de Clean Code e Design Patterns.

Requisitos

: • Experiência avançada com Node.js (Express, NestJS). • Experiência com React.js e boas práticas de frontend. • Conhecimento sólido em bancos SQL e ORM (Sequelize e TypeORM). • Experiência com criação e gerenciamento de Jobs/crons para automação. • Conhecimento avançado em Docker para criação e gerenciamento de containers. • Experiência com orquestração de deploys usando Argo CD. • Prática com CI/CD e deploys automatizados. • Boa experiência com integração de APIs e segurança (JWT, OAuth, OpenID). • Sólidos conhecimentos em estruturas de dados, algoritmos e padrões de arquitetura.

Diferenciais

: • Experiência com NestJS e arquitetura Clean Code. • Conhecimento em Kubernetes e infraestrutura como código. • Experiência com mensageria (Redis).

title: Key Account Sênior
description:
Fundada em 1916, a NSK é uma multinacional japonesa especializada na fabricação de rolamentos automotivos e industriais. Com presença global, a empresa se destaca por suas soluções de alta precisão, garantindo o funcionamento confiável de diversos sistemas. Comprometida com a inovação, investe em pesquisa e desenvolvimento e adota rigorosas políticas ambientais e de qualidade. Além de sua atuação industrial, a NSK valoriza a responsabilidade social e o bem-estar, promovendo iniciativas para a comunidade e o meio ambiente.

Se você é apaixonado(a) pelo que faz e busca novos desafios, queremos conhecê-lo(a)!

Key Account Sênior - Suzano/SP O profissional será responsável por

gerenciar e fortalecer o relacionamento com os principais distribuidores

, identificar oportunidades de negócios e implementar estratégias para maximizar o volume de vendas na região. Além disso, atuará na análise e desenvolvimento do mercado dentro do segmento de rolamentos, garantindo crescimento sustentável e alinhamento com os objetivos da empresa.

Requisitos Formação completa em Engenharia. Experiência sólida em gestão de contas de empresas no segmento de componentes de máquinas

(vedações, buchas, engrenagens, bombas, rolamentos, motores elétricos, correntes, correias, entre outros). Forte habilidade de negociação e comunicação. Disponibilidade para viagens frequentes. Inglês e Excel Avançados.

Benefícios:

Refeição no local, vale alimentação, custos de viagem à trabalho cobertos pela empresa, veículo dedicado, cartão corporativo, seguro de vida, plano de saúde, plano odontológico, previdência privada, PLR, estacionamento e mais!

title: Gerente de Projetos (Temporário) - São Paulo/SP
description:
Contratação temporária Descrição da Vaga:

Estamos em busca de um Gerente de Projetos para integrar nossa equipe de Soluções de Conteúdo. Este profissional será responsável por garantir operações eficientes, assegurando que as entregas de mídia, conteúdo e criadores sejam realizadas conforme acordado com os clientes. Além disso, o gerente de projetos deverá manter uma comunicação eficaz com parceiros multifuncionais, equipe de vendas e stakeholders internos e externos.

Principais Atividades: Co-criar com a equipe de planejamento e executar projetos, incluindo escopo, cronograma, orçamento, recursos e atividades necessárias para atingir os objetivos do projeto. Gerenciar a equipe do projeto (interna e externa): Alocar recursos apropriados, atribuir tarefas e responsabilidades, supervisionar atividades e garantir o alinhamento com os objetivos do projeto. Promover um ambiente de trabalho colaborativo e motivador. Monitorar e controlar o progresso do projeto, garantindo que as metas sejam alcançadas dentro dos prazos e recursos estabelecidos. Manter uma comunicação clara e eficaz com todas as partes interessadas do projeto, incluindo membros da equipe, equipe de vendas, outros PMs, clientes, fornecedores e outras partes envolvidas. Gerenciar riscos: Identificar e avaliar riscos do projeto, desenvolver estratégias de mitigação e tomar medidas preventivas para minimizar impactos negativos. Gerenciar mudanças no escopo do projeto e resolver problemas que possam surgir durante a execução. Participar de lançamentos de projetos para a equipe de vendas, abordando questões sobre entregas e o processo do projeto. Participar de reuniões com clientes, fornecer suporte nas comunicações de acompanhamento e definir próximos passos. Obter insights dos dados e usar essas informações para fazer recomendações e informar planos e iniciativas futuras.

Requisitos: Experiência comprovada em gerenciamento de projetos, preferencialmente em áreas relacionadas a mídia, conteúdo e parcerias comerciais. Habilidades de comunicação excepcionais, capazes de manter um diálogo claro e eficaz com diversas partes interessadas. Capacidade de liderança e gestão de equipes, promovendo um ambiente colaborativo e motivador. Conhecimento em gerenciamento de riscos e capacidade de desenvolver estratégias de mitigação. Habilidade para trabalhar sob pressão e cumprir prazos rigorosos. Proatividade na resolução de problemas e adaptação a mudanças no escopo do projeto. Familiaridade com ferramentas de gerenciamento de projetos e análise de dados. Inglês avançado para conversação.

title: Python/Django Developer SR
description:
Python/Django Developer SR Location:

Brazil Job Mode:

Full-time Work Mode:

Work from home

Job Summary

We are looking for Software Developers with strong experience with BE Python/Django. The selected persons will join a highly qualified team and work directly with the client daily. You will have a lot of autonomy in the project to propose enhancements to solutions or processes, bring new ideas, and work together to achieve a scalable and secure solution.

Responsibilities and Duties

Work in a dynamic team to provide operational solutions for complex architectures; Raise and discuss trade-offs of different design approaches and elaborate detailed design documents; Digest requirements from the product team and work on solutions with performance and scalability features for cloud systems; Improve and maintain AWS infrastructure focusing on security and cost-related aspects; Develop solution components in partnership with the customer's dev team; Participate in technical discussions with customer operations and development team; Follow Agile processes and participate actively in all development phases, fostering a culture of collaboration.

Essential Skills

Experience with cloud computing (preferably AWS) including provisioning and operations activities; Experience with Python/Django; Experience with container technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes; Experience or knowledge with consuming web services-based APIs (RESTful or SOAP-based); Experience with Git; Comfortable with Linux Environment for development; Experience with SQL and NoSQL Databases.

Highly Desirable Skills

Knowledge/Experience in Apache Airflow; Experience with development in Javascript; Knowledge/Experience with Angular; HTML and CSS concepts.

About Encora

Encora is the preferred digital engineering and modernization partner of some of the world’s leading enterprises and digital native companies. With over 9,000 experts in 47+ offices and innovation labs worldwide, Encora’s technology practices include Product Engineering & Development, Cloud Services, Quality Engineering, DevSecOps, Data & Analytics, Digital Experience, Cybersecurity, and AI & LLM Engineering.

At Encora, we hire professionals based solely on their skills and qualifications, and do not discriminate based on age, disability, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or nationality.

title: Manual/Automation Tester
description:
Our client is a leading global Healthcare Equipments provider. Tester will contribute/take part in the testing lifecycle of various CS&ES AM applications. The person will be involved in testing for various rollouts, while supporting the IT Service team with various testing activities and get involved in automation activities on need basis.

Task and Responsibilities •⁠ ⁠Understood and guide the creation of Test Scenarios based on the Requirements. •⁠ ⁠Responsible for creation of test designs, test processes, test cases and test data. •⁠ ⁠Carry out testing as per the defined procedures. •⁠ ⁠Participate in walkthroughs of testing procedures. •⁠ ⁠Prepare all reports related to software testing carried out. •⁠ ⁠Ensure that all tested related work is carried out as per the defined standards and procedures. •⁠ ⁠Identify automation opportunities. •⁠ ⁠Curate and manage the data required for executing the test scenarios. •⁠ ⁠Setup and execute test scenarios or support the Functional Teams for the execution of Test Scenarios. •⁠ ⁠Report on the progress of test execution. Capture the test evidence following the Quality guidelines. •⁠ ⁠Record issues (defects).

Education:

University degree in engineering/ computer science or similar

Technical Skills: •⁠ ⁠Must be able to demonstrate expertise in manual and / or automated testing, negative testing, and regression testing. •⁠ ⁠Must be able to support multiple activities in the testing lifecycle. •⁠ ⁠Must be able to demonstrate experience in using Service Now/ HPQC/ Azure DevOps for managing test cases, test execution and recording and reporting test results. •⁠ ⁠Contact/Call Center testing experience (optional) •⁠ ⁠Interface testing/Data exchange testing •⁠ ⁠Regression testing. •⁠ ⁠Web and Windows (UWP) application testing and automation •⁠ ⁠Test automation •⁠ ⁠Up-to-date knowledge of software test design and testing methodologies. •⁠ ⁠Working knowledge of test techniques and compatibility with various software programs.

Non-Technical Skills: •⁠ ⁠Must be able to communicate and work effectively in a multi-cultural environment. Must possess the ability to collaborate remotely with the functional teams in Germany and the USA. •⁠ ⁠Must be a self-starter, capable of working with very little supervision •⁠ ⁠Must be capable of taking initiative, with a firm understanding of the final goal to be achieved •⁠ ⁠Must be an excellent team player •⁠ ⁠Good organizational skills and detail-oriented mindset

title: Lead Data Architect (Remote Brazil)
description:
Project Description:

Building a risk applications and tools for innovative international top-tier hedge fund from the ground up, comprising the systems for traders, pre-trade checks and analysis, risks and limits management, reports of trading activities, FIX connectivity, market data providers connectivity (e.g. Bloomberg B-pipe), etc The Team is focused on the development and maintenance of various database applications supporting Risk Management. The successful candidate will have considerable and proven experience in database design, PL/SQL development, a good working knowledge of end-user and server-side data processing techniques, a good understanding of SDLC and agile development methodologies.

Responsibilities: Developing business friendly data models. Migration from SQL Server -> Fabric and/or Azure

Mandatory Skills Description: - Strong understanding of data modelling and data quality principles - Experience across data architecture and data warehousing techniques and practices is essential (experience migrating SQL to Fabric). - Proven experience in designing and developing data models using industry best practices - Experience in using code management and CI/CD tools such as Github, Azure Devops, Jenkins, Bamboo etc. - Senior (10+ years) MS SQL Server developer/architect. - Azure fabric serviсe experience - 10+ years of experience working with ETL tools such as SSIS, ADF or similar. - Good understanding and demonstrated experience working with Power Query (M query language) and DAX. - Management of Power BI datasets, workspaces and the associated security requirements. - Familiarity with Power BI Premium capabilities, Power BI Rest APIs, Python and Databricks will be highly regarded. - Extensive experience designing and developing reports and performance metrics from complex and disparate platforms

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: - Experience with Azure - Risks trading system development experience. - Business knowledge in trading domain / capital

Languages: English: B2 Upper Intermediate

title: Business Development and Account Manager
description:
We are looking for an Business Development and Account Manager (Brazil)

Description of work: We are looking for a Sales and Account Manager, responsible for Brazil, to create long-term, trusting relationships with our customers. The role is to oversee a portfolio of assigned customers, develop new business from existing clients and actively seek new sales opportunities. This position may require travel up to 30%.

Position Responsibilities · Serve as the lead point of contact for all customer account management matters, · Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships, · Develop new business opportunities with present and new customers in dedicated region and create new opportunities based on an in-depth understanding of market potential, specific customer requirements and company capabilities, · Generate sales revenue with existing customers in line with the organization objectives and goals, · Negotiate contracts and close agreements to maximize profits, · Develop trusted advisor relationships with key accounts, customer stakeholders and partners, · Clearly communicate the progress of monthly/quarterly initiatives to internal and external stakeholders, · Present the business case for pursuing specific opportunities including profit potential, strategic advantage, competitive analysis and win probability, · Meet commitments within cost, schedule and performance parameters, · Adapt to changing business environment and priorities by complex problem solving and conflict resolution, · Undertake other duties/projects assigned.

Desired Skills and Experience · Relevant Work Experience: 5+ years either in Technical or Account/Sales related position where constant communication with external customers has been required · Business Understanding: Knowledge of the Airport/Ground Handler/Airline Industry · Ability to grasp the technology and product concepts to refer their value to customers · Demonstrable ability to communicate, present and influence key stakeholders at all levels of an organization, including executive and C-level

title: Director, Brazil BD & Strategic Partnership
description:
We are poised to revolutionize the healthcare industry through innovative reagent and instrument platform solutions. With a focus on expanding into the Brazil market, we're seeking a strategic and results-driven Business Development Manager or Director to spearhead our growth initiatives.

As our Brazil BD Director, you will play a pivotal role in driving market expansion efforts and forging key partnerships in Brazil. Leveraging your expertise in business development and strategic planning, you will identify and capitalize on opportunities to establish Fapon as a leader in the reagent and instrument platform sector.

Key Responsibilities

Explore and penetrate Brazil markets for Fapon's open platform in diagnosis, including reagent, instrument, and AI-enabled solution, with a focus on key product categories. Develop and execute strategic plans to engage potential customers, including Independent Clinical Laboratories, scientific research labs, distributors in the field of diagnostics, hospital systems, and other relevant stakeholders. Build and nurture strong relationships with partners and clients to drive business growth and revenue. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of our customers. Stay abreast of industry trends and competitor activities to identify opportunities for differentiation and innovation. Drive the development and implementation of marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and market presence.

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field; Or biological / medical education background with sales experiences. 5+ years of proven track record of success in business development, preferably within the biotech or healthcare industry. Be familiar with the IVD market of Brazil, well-known clinic requirements and pain points of IVD supply chain parts Strong strategic planning and analytical skills, with the ability to translate market insights into actionable plans. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and negotiate effectively with diverse stakeholders. Demonstrated leadership abilities, with experience managing cross-functional teams and driving results in a fast-paced environment. Experienced working with Chinese stakeholders within the global collaboration setting

Join Our Team and Grow with Us At Fapon, you'll be part of a dynamic team passionate about driving innovation in healthcare. We offer a collaborative work environment and the opportunity to impact the future of healthcare on a global scale.

Apply now to shape the future of healthcare at Fapon.
